criteria: Demonstrates consistent personal hygiene practices (e.g., showering, washing hands, using deodorant).
Demonstrates consistent dental hygiene practices (e.g., brushing, flossing, regular dental check-ups).
Takes responsibility for maintaining personal hygiene and dental hygiene.
descriptions: Student does not demonstrate any personal hygiene practices.
Student demonstrates minimal personal hygiene practices inconsistently.
Student demonstrates some personal hygiene practices, but needs reminders and is not always consistent.
Student consistently demonstrates basic personal hygiene practices with minimal prompting.
Student consistently and independently demonstrates good personal hygiene practices and understands their importance.
Student consistently and independently demonstrates excellent personal hygiene practices, understands their importance, and encourages others to do the same.
Student does not demonstrate any dental hygiene practices.
Student demonstrates minimal dental hygiene practices inconsistently.
Student demonstrates some dental hygiene practices, but needs reminders and is not always consistent.
Student consistently demonstrates basic dental hygiene practices with minimal prompting.
Student consistently and independently demonstrates good dental hygiene practices and understands their importance.
Student consistently and independently demonstrates excellent dental hygiene practices, understands their importance, and educates others about dental health.
Student does not take responsibility for any aspect of personal and dental hygiene.
Student takes very limited responsibility for personal and dental hygiene, requiring constant supervision.
Student takes some responsibility for personal and dental hygiene but needs regular reminders and assistance.
Student generally takes responsibility for personal and dental hygiene with occasional reminders.
Student consistently takes responsibility for personal and dental hygiene and seeks help when needed.
Student proactively takes responsibility for personal and dental hygiene, anticipates needs, and helps others maintain their hygiene.
